citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 3:00 PM on June
14, 2023. The licensee was on site but needed to leave soon and would not have time to complete an inspection. No
other adult was available.
End Section
